# Definitions file for SubsMangler.
# DO NOT edit this file UNLESS autoupdate feature is turned OFF.
# This file will be overwritten on every autoupdate.
#
# SubsMangler will remove every string in subtitle line that matches below
# regular expressions. If the line is empty after removing those strings,
# the entire line will be removed from subtitle file.
# Matching is case insensitive. File encoding is UTF-8.
#
# section heading lines support multiple sections in the same line:
# [secion1][section2]   # will be loaded if either section1 or section2 is called


# CCmarks section includes definitions for removing Hearing Impaired texts
[CCmarks]
^\[.*\]$   # matches: <BEGINLINE>[anything]<ENDLINE>
^\(.*\)$   # matches: <BEGINLINE>(anything)<ENDLINE>


# General Ads section includes generic definitions applicable to any language
[Ads]
# sub sites & tools
.*www.opensubtitles.org.*
.*podnapisi.net.*
.*SRT Converter.*
.*www.osdb.link.*
.*subtitletools.com.*
# domains
.*yahoo.com.*
.*facebook.com.*
.*gmail.com.*
.*hotmail.com.*
.*twitter.com.*
# movie specs
.*23.976.*
.*720p.*
.*1080p.*
.*hevc.*
.*x264.*
.*x265.*
.*divx.*
.*dvdrip.*
.*hddvd.*
.*bdrip.*
.*bluray.*
.*web.?dl.*
.*hdtv.*


# Language specific Ads sections include language specific definitions.
# Only one section is loaded based on subtitle language designation in subtitle file name
# Language codes must confirm to ISO 639-2
[Ads_eng]   # English
.*sync.*corrections.*by.*


[Ads_pol]   # Polish
.*napiprojekt.*
.*Project Haven.*
.*tłumaczenie.*korekta.*
.*kinomania.*
.*napisy24.*
.*napisy:.*
.*tłumaczenie:.*
.*korekta:.*
.*polish team.*
.*ProHaven.*
.*RebelSubTeam.*
.*wersja:.*
.*napisyinfo.*
.*Tłumaczenie ze słuchu.*
.*oceń.*napisy.*
.*grupa.*hatak.*
